snippet: Philadelphia goalie Ilya Bryzgalov's lethal giveaway in the Flyers' loss to the Devils on Tuesday night raised the question of whether goalies practice routine relay passes and dump-offs enough.
abstract: Philadelphia goalie Ilya Bryzgalov's lethal giveaway in the Flyers' loss to the Devils on Tuesday night raised the question of whether goalies practice routine relay passes and dump-offs enough.

headline.main: Despite Appearances, Goalies Say They Practice Those Routine Plays
